import React, { useContext } from "react"; import IngredienstList from "./IngredientsList"; import { RecipeContext } from "./App"; import AuthorList from "./AuthorList"; export default function Recipe(props) { const { handleRecipeDelete, handleRecipeSelect } = useContext(RecipeContext); const { id, name, cookTime, servings, instructions, ingredients , authors } = props; return (

{name}

Cook Time: {cookTime}
Servings: {servings}
Instructions:
{instructions}
Ingredients:
Author(s):
); }
